SummaryEnglish: Hello Kitty's Furry Theater is an American-Japanese co-produced animated series based on the popular Japanese character, Hello Kitty. The series involved her and her friends doing their own version of popular fairy tales and stories. Each of the 13 half-hour episodes consisted of two 11-minute cartoons, for a total of 26 “shows”; each show was a spoof of a well-known fairy tale or movie.

1.TitleEnglish: Hello Kitty to Mimmy Atarashii Kasa
1.SummaryEnglish: is a 1981 Hello Kitty and Mimmy puppet movie, released on March 14, 1981 and regarded as the first animated Hello Kitty work. It was a tie-in release with Unico at Japanese theatres.
Hello Dorothy returns home from the Land of Paws with the help of the Tin Penguin, Scarecrow Chip and the Cowardly Rabbit after overcoming the Wicked Witchy (Catnip).

2.SummaryEnglish: Granpappetto Kitty wishes for a son and his penguin puppet comes to life.

3.SummaryEnglish: Cinderkitty captures the heart of Prince Purrfect and becomes head cheerleader for the Royals, not thanks to her wicked stepmother and stepsister.

4.SummaryEnglish: When the village of Hamhocks is attacked by a plague of fleas, the Pawed Piper saves the day.

5.SummaryEnglish: K.T. is saved by UFO hunters Dr. Catnip and Mr. Grinder by Sam, Chip and Melody when she's separated from her parents while picnicking on Earth.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kitty and chip help Peter Penguin rescue Dinglebell from the evil Captain Claw.

7.TitleEnglish: Kitty Locks and the Three Bears (1)
7.SummaryEnglish: Kittylocks gets in trouble when she enters the house of the Three Bears and eats their pizza, among other things.

8.TitleEnglish: Paws - The Great White Dog Shark (2)
8.SummaryEnglish: Surfer Kitty, Dr. Chip and lifeguard Surfer Sam save the island of Catalina and the Catamonica Pier from the wood-chewing great white dog-sha

9.SummaryEnglish: Fluke Penguin learns the power of "The Fur" from Obie Cat-Nobie and helps Princess Kitty, C-3-Seal-O and R-2-Hop-To save the planet Caturn.

10.SummaryEnglish: Baby Tar-Sam Penguins, raised by apes, is pursued by Hunter catnip and Bwana Grinder but evades them.

11.SummaryEnglish: Princess Kitty doesn't invite Bratnip to her party and Bratnip's mom puts a curse on her--if she watches TV, she'll sleep forever.

12.SummaryEnglish: Stranded on an island, Kitty is captured by the giant Kong who is taken to New York City by Catnip, where Kitty helps him escape.

13.SummaryEnglish: Handsome prince Tuxedo Sam is turned into an ugly beast by witch Fangora and Troll Grinder. Kitty Falls for the hapless beast.

14.SummaryEnglish: Little Red Bunny Hood goes west to visit her Grandma Kitty. But on the way Kitty faces a multiple challenges.

15.TitleEnglish: Snow White Kitty and the one Dwarf (1)
15.SummaryEnglish: Evil Queen Catnip wants to banish Snow White, but she is befriended by Dwarf Grinder who saves her.

16.SummaryEnglish: Prince Sam saves her from the last attack. Dr. Frankencat and assistant Igor build a better monster who takes My Melody away from her aunt.

17.SummaryEnglish: Milk-drinking vampire Catula terrorizes Catsylvania and Grandma Kitty needs help. Hello Kitty, My Melody, Tuxedo Sam and Chip find a way to stop her.

18.SummaryEnglish: Morgan La Fur and the Black Knight steal Excalibur but Sir Lancelot Penguin and Arthur retrieve it.

19.SummaryEnglish: Kitty must spin straw to gold for King Sam while Wizardess Fangora promotes daughter Catnip to be his queen. Rumpeldogskin helps and tricks Kitty.

20.SummaryEnglish: Maid Kitty is taken by Sheriff Grinder and Robin Penguin must joust to win her back.

21.SummaryEnglish: Hello Mother Goose turns detective to help her friends regain what each has lost.

22.SummaryEnglish: Reporter Hello Kitty and photographer My Melody go down under to interview legendary Crocodile Penguin. Crocodile Penguin is forced into a championship wrestling match.

23.TitleEnglish: Grinder Genie and the Magic Lamp (1)
23.SummaryEnglish: Kitty and Sam find a magic lamp with a dump Genie inside it.

24.SummaryEnglish: Mama Quackling hatches four babies: Hello, Melody, Catnip and Ugly. Ugly saves sister Catnip over the winter from Grinder Fox after she hurts her wing becoming a handsome swan in the spring.

25.SummaryEnglish: Mean, nasty Catnip hijacks Christmas by stealing decorations and presents, but is foiled by the Holiday Sprite.

26.SummaryEnglish: Weird happenings at a theater are finally found to be caused by Mowser the Mouse.
